description.value:
Trigger A non-devil creature moves into the light

Effect The light expands to fill the room, and each nondevil creature within the room must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save. A high-pitched chime sounds in the barracks (area D15), audible in this room as well. The trap then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for [[/br 1d4 #Duration Stupefied]]{1d4 rounds} and paralyzed for 1 round.

details.description: When any creature other than a devil enters the light, the magic interwoven in the light holds the creature in place and rings an alarm.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Distort or Diffuse the Light|traits:magical,trap] (master) to distort or diffuse the light, keeping the light cone intact but preventing the trap from triggering, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (4th level; counteract DC 26) to dispel the light, leaving the room in darkness
details.reset: The stasis magic in the light builds up over the course of an hour, after which the trap can trigger again.
details.routine: (1 action) All @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] creatures in the room take [[/r 1d10[mental]]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:26|basic:true|traits:magical,trap] save). Creatures who fail also become paralyzed for 1 round but can use a reaction to mentally fight off this stasis; creatures who do so take [[/r 5d10[mental]]] damage mental damage but are no longer paralyzed.
